about_the_game:
This is a Low-priced practical erotic game.

《Contents》

  • 15 separate CGs (Over 90 CGs in total!)
  • 15 H-scenes
  • Japanese voice acting for the main female character

《Features》

  • You can have the same experience as the protagonist.
  • You can click on the heroine and enjoy her reactions.
  • Two endings
  • CG Gallery Mode
  • Scene Replay Mode

《Story》


"Quit your yammering and get back to work!"

That sharp-eyed woman is Kanade Otoya, the store owner's wife.

The manager here isn't just tough; she never changes her mind
and won't tolerate a single word from others about how the shop is run.
However, she's convinced things aren't going well because of everyone but her
and flips out at me and the part-time staff, so I haven't been able to find a solution.

I force a smile in an attempt to avoid her wrath,
and she heads to her office, where she remains for the next few hours.
When I glance at my watch, I notice it has gotten quite late.

It should be okay for me to go home now.
I approach the door to the manager's office to let her know I'm leaving.

"Khh… mmm… mm… Ngh… mm… ah…"

What the hell are those sounds?
I'm about to knock on the door when I notice strange noises coming from within.
There's a kind of vulgarity in the air, which makes me instinctively try to hide my presence.
Why is she moaning like that…? What's going on inside?

Full of trepidation, I softly crack open the door…

《Character》


■Kanade Otoya (VA: Nanami Natsukawa)
Measurements: height 160cm, bust 95cm (F cup), waist 59cm, hips 96 cm

Self-assured and stubborn. Believes she's #1.
The wife of an owner of many convenience stores.
She manages one of those stores in place of her husband, who is constantly bouncing around between his other stores.
She's something of a sadist, and she's even gotten herself off on her own poor treatment of others.

*Before purchasing this product, we highly recommend that you play the demo [Japanese only] to check if the game works properly on your computer in your region.
*Appetite is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please contact Tensei Games.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and sexual scenes. Within those, there are also scenes that are possible to be interpreted as sexual violence or non-consensual sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 / AMD Athlon64 and higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Over 800 X 600 resolution Over TrueColor (32bit)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2duo / AMD Phenom and higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Over 800 X 600 resolution Over TrueColor (32bit)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound

short_description: Low-priced practical erotic game! Try to make this headstrong, uppity, over-30 woman with a super-sexy body submit to you.
